refnamediv.refpurpose: A collection of utility functions to help with UI related issues

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The UI utilities do man things, mostly concerned with smoothing the flow of XML data from containee to container. There are also several generaly useful functions used internaly for manipulating pixmaps. Also, code for stringifying accelerators, fixing up help and working around libxml bugs. Also a large chunk of code is included for dynamic UI tree building that is now strongly deprecated by the various tools to do this from dynamic files.

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_pixbuf_to_xml ()
refsect2.para: Convert a pixbuf to a string representation suitable for passing as a "pixname" attribute with a pixtype attribute = "pixbuf".

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_xml_to_pixbuf ()
refsect2.para: This converts a stringified pixbuf in xml into a GdkPixbuf

listitem.simpara: a handed reference to the created GdkPixbuf.

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_xml_get_icon_widget ()
refsect2.para: This function extracts a pixbuf from the node and returns a GtkWidget containing a display of the pixbuf.

listitem.simpara: the desired size of the icon

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_xml_set_pixbuf ()
refsect2.para: Associate pixbuf with this node by stringifying it and setting the requisite attributes.

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_build_help_menu ()
refsect2.programlisting: void bonobo_ui_util_build_help_menu (BonoboUIComponent *listener, const char *app_prefix, const char *app_name, BonoboUINode *parent);
refsect2.para: This routine inserts all the help menu items appropriate for this application as children of the parent node.

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_get_ui_fname ()
refsect2.para: Builds a path to the xml file that stores the GUI.

listitem.simpara: the file name of the xml file.
the path to the file that describes the UI or NULL if it is not found.

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_translate_ui ()
refsect2.para: Quest through a tree looking for translatable properties ( those prefixed with an '_' ). Translates the value of the property and removes the leading '_'.

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_fixup_help ()
refsect2.programlisting: void bonobo_ui_util_fixup_help (BonoboUIComponent *component, BonoboUINode *node, const char *app_prefix, const char *app_name);
refsect2.para: This searches for 'BuiltMenuItems' placeholders, and then fills them with the application's menu items.

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_fixup_icons ()
refsect2.para: This function is used to ensure filename pixbuf attributes are converted to in-line pixbufs on the server side, so that we don't sent a ( possibly invalid ) filename across the wire.

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_new_ui ()
refsect2.programlisting: BonoboUINode* bonobo_ui_util_new_ui (BonoboUIComponent *component, const char *fname, const char *app_prefix, const char *app_name);
refsect2.para: Loads an xml tree from a file, cleans the doc cruft from its nodes; and translates the nodes.

listitem.simpara: The component help callback should be on
The translated tree ready to be merged.

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_set_ui ()
refsect2.programlisting: void bonobo_ui_util_set_ui (BonoboUIComponent *component, const char *app_prefix, const char *file_name, const char *app_name, CORBA_Environment *opt_ev);
refsect2.para: This function loads the UI from the associated file, translates it, fixes up all the menus, ensures pixbuf filenames are resolved to xml and then merges the XML to the remote container - this is the best and most simple entry point for the new UI code.

listitem.simpara: the filename of the file to merge relative to the prefix.
the application name - for help merging

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_set_pixbuf ()
refsect2.programlisting: void bonobo_ui_util_set_pixbuf (BonoboUIComponent *component, const char *path, GdkPixbuf *pixbuf, CORBA_Environment *opt_ev);
refsect2.para: This helper function sets a pixbuf at a certain path into an xml tree.

listitem.simpara: the path into the xml tree

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_accel_name ()
refsect2.para: This stringifies an accelerator_key and some accelerator_mods it is the converse of bonobo_ui_util_accel_parse

refsect2.title: bonobo_ui_util_accel_parse ()
refsect2.para: This parses the accelerator string and returns the key and mods associated with it - using a similar format to Gtk+ but one which doesn't involve inefficient XML entities and avoids other misc. problems.
